question: plz tell me any duaa that i can learn for good health and long life of my parents
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
?Rabbanaa aatinaa fid-dunyaa hasanatan wa fil aakhirat hasanatan wa qinaa adhaaban-naar?.

Trans: ?Oh our Lord! Grant us the good of this world, and the good of the hereafter and save us from the punishment of the fire.?

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
